metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44120 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: SPIP 4.0.0 is affected by a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ecrire/public/interfaces.php, adding the function safehtml to the vulnerable fields. An editor is able to modify his personal information. If the editor has an article written and available, when a user goes to the public site and wants to read the author's information, the malicious code will be executed. The "Who are you" and "Website Name" fields are vulnerable.

criterions.comment: spip package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
